item.title: ISLR CH8 Tree-Based Methods
item.description: Intuition Models Regression Trees Predicting Baseball Playersâ€™ Salaries Algorithm Tree Pruning References Intuition Regression/Classification Stratify or segment the predictor space into simple regions Prediction for a given observation: mean or mode of the training observations in the region to which it belongs The set of splitting rules can be summarized in a tree \(\Rightarrow\) Decision Tree Methods Pros: simple, easy to interpret, and nice to visualize

item.title: PCA
